My background includes working with modern software development practices and implementing resilient architectures using tools such as **Istio**, **GitOps**, and **Chaos Mesh**.

My technical qualifications are complemented by hands-on experience in implementing effective resilience testing strategies, utilizing **Litmus** and **Karpenter** to ensure system robustness. In addition to my technical skills, I excel in integrating **MLOps** workflows, a key advantage in implementing quality measures in ML pipelines. I am dedicated to delivering high-performance solutions within challenging environments while fostering collaboration across teams.
